item.title: Lecture 8: Plotting in Python
item.description: The lecture notes will be posted after the class. For now do this: Point your browser to http://colab.research.google.com Create a new Python3 notebbok Execute the following commans: # Colaboratory has an old version of seaborn, so let's upgrade !pip install seaborn --upgrade Import required libraries: import seaborn as sns sns.set(style="ticks") import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Import TnSeq datasets: %%bash wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/tnseq_untreated.txt.gz wget https://nekrut.github.io/BMMB554/ta_gc.txt Set datafile name:
